subject: RE: [junit] running junit method from ant build
msgSnippet: Did you look into a test suite? Something like: public class SomeTestSuite extends TestCase { public static Test suite() throws Exception { TestSuite suite =
messageBody:
Did you look into a test suite? Something like:



public class SomeTestSuite extends TestCase {

public static Test suite() throws Exception {

TestSuite suite = new TestSuite();

suite.addTest(new SomeTest("testSomeThing"));

}

}



Scott

Subject: [junit] running junit method from ant build
